instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3435-B (APFS support)
threads.message:
I purchased 12 820-3435-B boards on eBay. I have fixed two of them so far and none of them have APFS support. These are all 1.3Ghz 4G boards. I am using one right now on my bench to type this. Each one was locked and I have removed that but now I need to add APFS support to them. When I sell them it will be a huge mess if they don't have APFS support.

I am running El Captain 11.3 on my tech drive and that is the drive I am using now.
Is there a bios update I can run on these?

threads.title: 820-3435-B (APFS support)
threads.message:
Take an empty SSD (or no important data) and do fresh install of HS, or Mojave.
MUST be done on INTERNAL SSD!

threads.title: 820-3435-B (APFS support)
threads.message: I can't flash the machine?  I have to install the OS?  I have 12 boards to do.   That will take a long time.

threads.title: 820-3435-B (APFS support)
threads.message:
Once you get one machine working, read the BIOS and flash it on the others.
Do NOT forget to CLEAN ME region on each machine after that!
You should also replace SVS area (SN) and fix checksum at the end.

threads.title: 820-3435-B (APFS support)
threads.message: what is the SVS area?  I ordered a Medusa but it has not come in yet.

threads.title: 820-3435-B (APFS support)
threads.message:
Mea culpa, is Fsys area...
You should replace entire block between Fsys and $SVS strings in BIOS; BEFORE SVS area...

threads.title: 820-3435-B (APFS support)
threads.message: Do you recommend a good website or youtube channel that covers all of this?

threads.title: 820-3435-B (APFS support)
threads.message:
Medusa manual should be good enough, when you get it.
Search on the forum, we discussed many times about changing serial number in correct way.
